yusabbiḥu lillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi lahu al-mul'ku walahu al-ḥamdu wahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
huwa alladhī khalaqakum faminkum kāfirun waminkum mu'minun wal-lahu bimā taʿmalūna baṣīrun
khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa bil-ḥaqi waṣawwarakum fa-aḥsana ṣuwarakum wa-ilayhi al-maṣīru
yaʿlamu mā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wayaʿlamu mā tusirrūna wamā tuʿ'linūna wal-lahu ʿalīmun bidhāti al-ṣudūri
alam yatikum naba-u alladhīna kafarū min qablu fadhāqū wabāla amrihim walahum ʿadhābun alīmun
dhālika bi-annahu kānat tatīhim rusuluhum bil-bayināti faqālū abasharun yahdūnanā fakafarū watawallaw wa-is'taghnā al-lahu wal-lahu ghaniyyun ḥamīdun
zaʿama alladhīna kafarū an lan yub'ʿathū qul balā warabbī latub'ʿathunna thumma latunabba-unna bimā ʿamil'tum wadhālika ʿalā al-lahi yasīrun
faāminū bil-lahi warasūlihi wal-nūri alladhī anzalnā wal-lahu bimā taʿmalūna khabīrun

yawma yajmaʿukum liyawmi al-jamʿi dhālika yawmu al-taghābuni waman yu'min bil-lahi wayaʿmal ṣāliḥan yukaffir ʿanhu sayyiātihi wayud'khil'hu jannātin tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru khālidīna fīhā abadan dhālika al-fawzu al-ʿaẓīmu
wa-alladhīna kafarū wakadhabū biāyātinā ulāika aṣḥābu al-nāri khālidīna fīhā wabi'sa al-maṣīru
mā aṣāba min muṣībatin illā bi-idh'ni al-lahi waman yu'min bil-lahi yahdi qalbahu wal-lahu bikulli shayin ʿalīmun
wa-aṭīʿū al-laha wa-aṭīʿū al-rasūla fa-in tawallaytum fa-innamā ʿalā rasūlinā al-balāghu al-mubīnu
al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa waʿalā al-lahi falyatawakkali al-mu'minūna
yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū inna min azwājikum wa-awlādikum ʿaduwwan lakum fa-iḥ'dharūhum wa-in taʿfū wataṣfaḥū wataghfirū fa-inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
innamā amwālukum wa-awlādukum fit'natun wal-lahu ʿindahu ajrun ʿaẓīmun
fa-ittaqū al-laha mā is'taṭaʿtum wa-is'maʿū wa-aṭīʿū wa-anfiqū khayran li-anfusikum waman yūqa shuḥḥa nafsihi fa-ulāika humu al-muf'liḥūna
in tuq'riḍū al-laha qarḍan ḥasanan yuḍāʿif'hu lakum wayaghfir lakum wal-lahu shakūrun ḥalīmun
